metadata.title: CVE-2021-20308 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in the htmldoc 1.9.11 and before may allow attackers toexecute arbitrary code and cause a denial of service that is similar toCVE-2017-9181.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-20308` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

htmldoc - 1.9.11-3
htmldoc-common - 1.9.11-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmldoc package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.9.11-3').
